Class PatternsCatalog

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.eteks.sweethome3d.model.PatternsCatalog

  • public class PatternsCatalog
extends Object
    A catalog of texture images used as patterns to fill plan areas.

    2.0
    Author:
    Emmanuel Puybaret
